reviews.review:
Phenom of a movie! All those things I wanted to see, and a bunch I didn't know I wanted, are all right here. Perfect comic book ending, completely left me salivating for the next issue.
Great job Marvel, now just get the ink dry and bring home the X-Men! I watch that 4 hr movie.

The best Marvel movie so far! Marvel really blew it out of the park with this one and it does not disappoint. It has scenes that are funny, shocking, and mind blowing. The 10 year wait was definitely worth it!
Movie is thrilling and I believe that IW is significant for the future super hero movies. Movie was full of unexpected moments.

Avengers: Infinity War is a thrilling crossover for the Marvel Cinematic Universe heroes. It is filled with action-packed scenes and great visuals, also humors and funny one-liners are not absent in this one and audience will surely love every bit of it. Seeing your favorite heroes come in together in one film is a priceless gift you can get but also seeing them becoming lifeless one by one is a heartbreaking thing to see.

Brilliant ending of the first 10 years of the mcu, a villain that feels like a real threat, deeply emotional and doesnt let you blink. As the massive corssover movie it is, it doesnt have a lot of talking, since you already know everything from the last 18 movies, but instead focuses on the action, interactions of the characters, and the villain development. Thrilling.

One of the best movies of all time! Finally another film that compares to Empire Strikes Back! No film has ever had as many beloved characters that have been developed so much. Thanos is the greatest villain of all time. This movie is the adventure of a lifetime and sets up an incredible final sequel.

Not perfect, but still amazing! It's a bit quick in some storylines and character's arc, but for so many characters put together it works. They really did it! If you are not following the stories of each hero it might be a bit difficult to understand everything the first time, but surely there is at least one of your friends who does, so feel free to ask to understand it fully! Fans, you'll love it! 8/10
Infinity war good or bad ? Good is a fucking understand statement

iâ€™m surprised it only received 84% ... this movie deserves an oscar, only because nothing like that has been done before... 2.5 and not one boring moment to create something of this magnitude is pretty impressive .. make sure to watch on IMAX
